rules_text:
[i]Constellation[/i] – Whenever an enchantment you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter onto Pi, Temple Striker, and draw a card. 
{2}{G}{W}: Bless. [i](Create a colorless Blessing aura enchantment token attached to a nonland permanent with “Enchant nonland permanent” and “As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it gets +1/+1.”)[/i]
